mean_cn: adj.甜的；可爱的，美好的；芳香的；  n.糖果，甜食
mean_en: containing, or tasting as if it contains, a lot of sugar; having a pleasant smell; having a pleasant sound; (especially of children or small things) attractive; having or showing a kind character
sentence: Most kids love sweet food such as candy.
sentence_trans: 大多数小孩都喜欢吃甜食，比如糖。
